name: tiktok-studio-evoke
description: TikTok Studio Scraper with React UI

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "VITE,EXPRESS,FASTAPI" -c "cyan,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run install:python
